xmlText.p: BALTIMORE ORIOLES — Agreed to terms with RHP Chris Tillman on a one-year contract.
BOSTON RED SOX — Traded OF Bryce Brentz to Pittsburgh for cash considerations.
HOUSTON ASTROS — Named Mark Zarthar president of Fayetteville (Carolina).
MINNESOTA TWINS — Agreed to terms with RHP Anibal Sanchez on a one-year contract.
TAMPA BAY RAYS — Traded DH Corey Dickerson to Pittsburgh for RHP Daniel Hudson, INF Tristan Gray and cash.
FARGO-MOORHEAD REDHAWKS — Traded RHP Carlos Pimentel to Cleburne for future considerations.
SIOUX CITY EXPLORERS — Signed INF Nate Samson. Traded INF Tanner Vavra, INF Joel Davis and OF Jayce Ray to Sussex County (Can-Am) for INF Jay Baum.
ST. PAUL SAINTS — Signed INF Josh Allen.
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed RHP Dennis O'Grady.
TROIS-RIVIERES AIGLES — Signed RHP Yender Caramo.
ATLANTA HAWKS — Signed G Antonius Cleveland to a 10-day contract.
INDIANAPOLIS COLTS — Signed K Adam Vinatieri to a one-year contract extension.
ARIZONA COYOTES — Signed G Darcy Kuemper to a two-year contract.
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Recalled G Jack Campbell from Ontario (AHL). Assigned F Michael Mersch and D Paul LaDue to Ontario.
NEW YORK RANGERS — Recalled F Vinni Lettieri from Hartford (AHL).
AHL — Suspended Iowa D Hunter Warner one game for a kneeing incident in a game vs. Texas on Feb. 19.
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Recalled F Dan DeSalvo from Tulsa (ECHL). Traded F Eric Selleck to Belleville for future considerations.
ATLANTA UNITED — Signed MF Oliver Shannon.
COLORADO RAPIDS — Signed F Niki Jackson to a one year contract.
FC DALLAS — Signed G Kyle Zobeck.
LOS ANGELES FC — Signed D Tristan Blackmon.
MINNESOTA UNITED — Acquired MF Luiz Fernando on loan from Fluminense FC (Brazil) for the 2018 season.
NEW YORK RED BULLS — Named Carlo Acquista assistant scout.
SPORTING KANSAS CITY — Signed D/MF Brad Evans to a one-year contract.
RUTGERS — Named Noah Joseph co-defensive coordinator and safeties coach and Cory Robinston cornerbacks coach and pass game coordinator.
